ingredients: 1 1/4 cups cooked turkey or chicken, cubed
1 heaping Tablespoon jarred minced garlic or about 6 garlic cloves, minced
1 heaping Tablespoon jarred minced garlic or about 6 garlic cloves, minced
3 cans (14 and 1/2 ounces each) chicken broth
1 3/4 cups frozen, thawed tomatoes or 1 can tomatoes ( 14 1/2 ounces) undrained
1 cup frozen, thawed sliced zucchini or vegetable of your choice.
1 cup frozen, thawed kale, or 9 oz fresh kale ( fresh chard or spinach can be used)
2 1/4 teaspoons fresh basil or 3/4 teaspoon dried basil
Grated Parmesan for a topping before serving
